analysis.description:
PacioICO.Buy (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#504-524) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- pPCwalletA.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#516-517)

PacioICO.Buy (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#504-524) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-PIOE.Issue(msg.sender,picos) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#517)

PacioICO.Allocate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#543-546) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-PIOE.Issue(vSupplierA,picos) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#545)

Reentrancy in PacioICO.Allocate (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#543-546):
	External calls:
	- PIOE.Issue(vSupplierA,picos) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#545)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- picosSold (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#545)

Reentrancy in PacioICO.Buy (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#504-524):
	External calls:
	- PIOE.Issue(msg.sender,picos) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#517)
	External calls sending eth:
	- pPCwalletA.transfer(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#516-517)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- pausedB (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#520-523)
	- picosSold (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#518)

Reentrancy in PacioICO.PrepareToStart (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#480-500):
	External calls:
	- PIOE.PrepareForSale() (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#498)
	State variables written after the call(s):

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.15 (/unique_chucks/11/0x2b94e0c6ccb25ccf6b2dfa1a286712eb565437ee.sol#25-26): it allows old versions
